snippet.title: LifeAfter CG: Face it alone or Survive together?
snippet.description:
The English Version of LifeAfter has officially launched. Download the game right now, exploring the post apocalyptic world.
DOWNLOAD LINK: https://go.onelink.me/uf4S/87a509f4

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Under the siege of raging viruses and infecteds, the glorious civilization has lost all its meaning. Famine, cold and the fearfulness of being infected concerns the little girl at every sleepless night. She worries about if she can see the sunrise, while the sun only illuminates the ruins of despairs... In the end of the CG, the scar on the little girl’s leg leaves an infinite suspense…Can human race be rescued? 

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/LifeAfter.en/
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/tEUgCSa
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/LifeAfter_en
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/lifeafter_en/

Survivors, you can get online game services anytime in LifeAfter.

This video and content are copyrighted by LifeAfter official channel.
